nodes.text: The Atrakenite Guild of Miners was an organization that ran the day-to-day affairs of the moon Trilos. Following the Battle of Atraken and the arrival of Atrakenite refugees from Atraken to Trilos, it was decided that the miners already living on the moon would organize the government since they were knowledgeable about the planetoid. The Atrakenite Guild of Miners was run by the eight-member Mining Council.
